fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A letter mistakenly suggested that public blood donor sessions were not currently taking place. In fact sessions have continued as normal throughout the pandemic with additional safety measures in place (4 December, page 5, Journal). • The pharmaceutical company Pfizer is American, not German as an article indicated (Major Sulk forgets the jingoism only to spout dodgy gags at PMQs, 3 December, page 7). • Other recently amended articles include: Covid vaccinations: when can we expect them to start in UK? First Thing: US marks record high in daily coronavirus deaths Italy bans travel between towns over Christmas The student loan interest rate is rising – what does it mean for you? George Russell has big boots to fill as he enjoys ‘surreal’ Mercedes chance Black official quit ‘racist’ Windrush compensation scheme
